Text.Page:
I haven't heard from {@LinkCreature:206#1006#Ethia} in quite some time. I was working with her before I came out here, but as I remember it, she didn't have much help.

I have to stay here, but it would be a huge favor if you could go see how things are going.

I'm certain she'll need help out there.

Yes! Yes, we do need help. I'm not sure who you are, but I'll learn your name eventually.

First, let's talk about what you're going to do for us.
